description: Triangle giving numerators of coefficients of Euler polynomials, highest powers first.
references: M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards Applied Math. Series 55, 1964 (and various reprintings), p. 809.
L. Comtet, Advanced Combinatorics, Reidel, 1974, p. 48, [14b].
links: M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards, Applied Math. Series 55, Tenth Printing, 1972 [alternative scanned copy].
maple: for n from 0 to 30 do for k from n to 0 by -1 do printf(`%d,`,numer(coeff(euler(n,x), x, k))) od:od:
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 27 2001
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Jan 29 2001
